TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RIPEMD160 extends System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RIPEMD160 Inherits HashAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示抽象類別，MD160 雜湊演算法的所有實作均繼承自此類別。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of the MD160 hash algorithm inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊函式的二進位字串對應任意長度的固定長度的小型二進位字串。Hash functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length. 密碼編譯雜湊函式具有屬性無法進行該雜湊處理至相同的值; 找到兩個不同的輸入也就是說，如果對應的資料也會比對，應該符合兩組資料的雜湊。A cryptographic hash function has the property that it is computationally infeasible to find two distinct inputs that hash to the same value; that is, hashes of two sets of data should match if the corresponding data also matches. 對資料進行小變更會導致無法預期的大量變更，雜湊。Small changes to the data result in large unpredictable changes in the hash. Ripemd-160 是 160 位元加密編譯雜湊函式。RIPEMD-160 is a 160-bit cryptographic hash function. 它適用於做為替代 MD4、 MD5 及 RIPEMD 的 128 位元雜湊函式。It is intended for use as a replacement for the 128-bit hash functions MD4, MD5, and RIPEMD. RIPEMD 是 EU 專案 RIPE （競爭完整性基本項目評估版，1988年 1992年） 架構中所開發。RIPEMD was developed in the framework of the EU project RIPE (RACE Integrity Primitives Evaluation, 1988-1992). > [!NOTE] > 已被取代的安全雜湊演算法 sha-256，以及 sha-512 和其衍生的類別中。 has been superseded by the Secure Hash Algorithms SHA-256 and SHA-512 and their derived classes. 和提供較佳的安全性和效能比。 and offer better security and performance than . 使用只為了與舊版的應用程式和資料的相容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會計算目錄中的所有檔案的雜湊。The following code example calculates the hash for all files in a directory. [!code-cpp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CPP/ripemd160.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CS/ripemd160.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/vb/ripemd160.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立抽象類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class. 應用程式程式碼會建立衍生類別的新執行個體。Application code will create a new instance of a derived class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會計算目錄中的所有檔案的雜湊。The following code example calculates the hash for all files in a directory. exception.span: 此演算法在聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS) 模式啟用的情況下使用，但是和 FIPS 並不相容。

span.span: The algorithm was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but it is not FIPS-compatible.
